content: now have a total of 60 68 stitches knit 3 rounds of stockinette stitch if you would like to add or decrease depth to you heel knit more/less rounds of stockinette stitch during this section begin to shape the heel as follows round one needle 1 and 3 k1 ssk k all remaining stitches needle 2 and 4 knit until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 round two knit all stitches continue to work these two rounds until you have a total of 24 stitches kitchener the heel in the same manner as the toe complete another heel on the second sock copyright laura linneman www theknitgirllls com llinnema@gmail com
